attributes.description: NMG Cape Town Quality Guarantee: As a standard included in your Service & Delivery Fee, all of our vehicles go for a full 160 Point Workshop Check as well as a roadworthy test to ensure that the vehicle is mechanically sound. We will attend to any minor dents or scratches to the exterior of the vehicle should there be any. A full interior valet & exterior polish is performed on each of our pre-owned vehicles at point of sale. Extended Service Plans & Warranties are available as an optional extra and can be bolted on to your finance. A variety of finance options available, tailor made to suite your pocket. Trade Ins are welcome! **Service & Delivery Fee not included in the advertised price.

attributes.description:
The Ford Fiesta 1.0T Titanium Auto is a neat hatchback that has been kept in fantastic condition. The vehicle comes with Bluetooth and Navigation and has very low mileage considering its year. Some of the extras on the vehicle include:

-Rear PDC
-Cruise Control
-Climate Control
-USB Port
-Multi Media Screen
-Multi Function Steering
-Electric Mirrors
-Electric Windows

Pop through to 91 Van Riebeeck Ave, Edenvale, Johannesburg, 1609 to test drive this lovely Ford Fiesta
